item.title: Upgrading the CLI experience
item.description: I spend a lot of time in the terminal. Obviously I practically live in the terminal at work, that’s kind of a given. But even this very post is written in Helix running in Wezterm. And it’s been like this (and even more so in my SysAdmin days) for close to 20 years. I already wrote about refreshing my CLI setup, and how I moved from tmux to Zellij to improve my CLI experience.
